title: ANGEL AND THE BADMAN video quality upgrade

sources.title: AngelAndTheBadManVideoQualityUpgrade
sources.description: This pristine print is much sharper and cleaner than the existing IA copies. Plus it has a smaller download file. Loner John Wayne changes his outlaw ways when he falls under the spell of beautiful Quaker Gail Russell, A classic American western with a solid cast, good production values and the Duke at his best. Written and directed by James Edward Grant. Released in 1947. a.k.a. "The Angel and the Outlaw" Complete print
